channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 4:42 p.m. Alarm response in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 4:42 p.m. Alarm response in Zaporizhzhia region. Stay tuned for further messages. #행햟쮐햦향혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 游 13:59 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for civilian evacuation - 0800339291
